paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 N372H polymorphism found in drug-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer patients.

patients.demographics: 10 patients with drug-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer, age range 39-70 years (median 48 years)

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 N372H polymorphism was found in 40% of drug-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer patients.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was not detected in drug-sensitive recurrent ovarian cancer patients.
key_quotes: BRCA2 N372H polymorphism was found in 40% (4/10) of drug-resistant recurrent ovarian cancer patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based solely on the BRCA2 variant mentioned in the text.
